content.description: Well deserving of its name, the crux of Masochistic is right off the deck. Inch your way up the first 10-15 feet of this off-width with crumbly, scaly feet. After that is easy fifth class to the top. Walk off the back.
content.protection: Requires a single BD #6. The guidebook says "pro up to 5 inches," but is wrong.
content.location: This route is the obvious split in the boulder that stares at you from the picnic area.

content.description:
This route is actually pretty cool! It features a short, laser-cut splitter crack that widens from .4s to .75s. The face is crumbly garbage but you should jam it straight-in anyway!

Start from a low angle fist crack on the ground and climb easy terrain up to a ledge. You can also access this ledge by scrambling in from climber's right.

From this ledge, fire off the thin splitter. It is short, but has some very cool movement. At the end of the crack, you can either continue to the top, or rap off webbing to your right.
content.protection: Cams .4-.75. Maybe a #4 if starting from bottom
content.location: On the back (north) side of the big rock formation a few hundred feet right (southeast) of Masochistic Opposite.
